# SEM

## CFA

```{r}


modelCode = "
  agree =~ A2 + A1 + A3 + A4 + A5
  neurot =~ N1 + N2 + N3 + N4 + N5

  # not necessary
  # agree ~~ neurot

  # if you don't want them correlated
  # agree ~~ 0*neurot
"

cfa_model = cfa(modelCode, data=bfi_trim)
summary(cfa_model, standardized=T, rsq=T, nd=2)
```
